r.d: RFC2518 compliant stream wrapper that allows to use WebDAV server resources like a regular file system from within PHP.
r.n: QA release SVN dir layout Bug #12854 is_file('webdav://foo/bar.txt') always returns false Bug #13229 Opening files for append does not place pointer at eof? Request #13876 Make User-Agent header configurable Bug #13948 HTTP/Request.php should be require_once'd Bug #14080 Suppress warning Bug #14088 fopen mode 'w' should truncate file Request #14089 support of "header" stream context option Bug #17791 Patch: Avoid deprecated ereg and split
